    • Method Detail

      • generateBoard

        public Sudoku generateBoard(int difficulty)
        Generates a full Sudoku, then "digs" holes to form the Sudoku game. The difficulty is set by the number of givens in total and the rows/columns, as well as the pattern being used |difficulty |givens |givens in row/columns |pattern |1 |>50 |5 |random |2 |36-49 |4 |random |3 |32-35 |3 |row by row |4 |28-31 |2 |snake |5 |22-27 |1 |LRTB
        Parameters:
        difficulty -
        Returns:
